Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write !,(##class(%CSP.Response).HyperEventBody()) Write !,"
",! Write "
Основные свойства",! Write "",! Write "


",! Write !,"
Да
" Write "   " Write !,"
Отмена
" Write !,"

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>"_($G(%session.Data("systemname")))_"</title>",! Write "<link href=""style.css"" type=text/css rel=stylesheet>" Write !,"<script language=""Jscript"" src=""common.js"">" Write "</script>" Write !,"<script language=""JScript"">" Write !,"function startFun(){",! Write "if(!window.confirm(""Внимание!\nУдаление свойства приведёт к потере данных хранящихся в этом свойстве у ВСЕХ товаров. На ВСЕХ складах.\nВы хотите удалить?""))return false;",! Write "ok="_($case(%session.BrokerImplementation,1:"cspRunServerMethod",2:"cspHttpServerMethod",:"cspSelectServerMethod"))_"('"_(..Encrypt($listbuild("Goods.GoodsAction.DeleteProperty:csp.delgoodsprop"))_$select(%session.UseSessionCookie'=2:"&CSPCHD="_%session.CSPSessionCookie,1:""))_"',PropTable.CurrentRowTag)",! Write "if(ok==1){returnValue=1;window.close();}",! Write "else{alert(ok);}",! Write "}",! Write !,"function load(){",! Write "PropTable.DownLoadPairs('','',""Weight,Size1,Name"");",! Write "}",! Write !,"</script>" Write !,(..HyperEventHead()) Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html XMLNS:SKLADz XMLNS:SKLAD2>" Write !,"<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLADz"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/treeview.htc"">",! Write "<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLAD2"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/table.htc"">",! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
